item.title: Chrome v58+ and self-signed certificates
item.description: This is a short guide to make self-signed HTTPS certificates work with locally hosted web applications and Google Chrome’s browser.

item.title: Ansible and my development enviroment
item.description: This is a short introduction to Ansible and a description of my first project, the automation of the configuration of my development laptop.
